title: Ep. 949 - A Horrible Statement By A Weak Leader
description:
Russian troops land in Ukraine, Kyle Rittenhouse launches an organization to bring down dishonest media companies, and a new poll shows that most Democrats approve of Justin Trudeau’s crackdown on the Freedom Convoy.
